Test Details

📅

Test Date

June 9, 2025

🎯

Eligibility

Open to students who have completed Class 12 and dream of cinema and visual arts as their career.

💰

Scholarship Value

Up to ₹1,00,000 per person. A total of ₹60 lakhs will be awarded as scholarship.

Course & Exam Info

🎓

Applicable Courses

  • BFA (Bachelor of Fine Arts)
  • BVA (Bachelor of Visual Arts)
  • Diploma Courses

(Approved and recognized by UGC & NEP)

📝

Exam Pattern

  • Duration: 1 Hour
  • Total Marks: 50
    • MCQs: 40 Questions (1 mark each)
    • Match the Following: 2 Questions (10 marks)
    • Descriptive: 4 Questions (5 marks each)

Test Details

📅

Test Date

June 9, 2025

🎯

Eligibility

Open to students who have completed Class 12 and dream of cinema and visual arts as their career.

💰

Scholarship Value

Up to ₹1,00,000 per person. A total of ₹60 lakhs will be awarded as scholarship.

🎓

Applicable Courses

  • BFA (Bachelor of Fine Arts)
  • BVA (Bachelor of Visual Arts)
  • Diploma Courses

(Approved and recognized by UGC & NEP)

📝

Exam Pattern

  • Duration: 1 Hour
  • Total Marks: 50
    • MCQs: 40 Questions (1 mark each)
    • Match the Following: 2 Questions (10 marks)
    • Descriptive: 4 Questions (5 marks each)

Test Details

📅

Test Date

June 9, 2025

🎯

Eligibility

Open to students who have completed Class 12 and dream of cinema and visual arts as their career.

💰

Scholarship Value

  • Up to ₹1,00,000 per person. A total of ₹60 lakhs will be awarded as scholarship.
  • Special scholarship schemes are also available for girl children, transgender and economically weaker sections of society for the entire duration of the program.

🎓

Applicable Courses

  • BFA (Bachelor of Fine Arts)
  • BVA (Bachelor of Visual Arts)
  • Diploma Courses

(Approved and recognized by UGC & NEP)

📝

Exam Pattern

  • Duration: 1 Hour
  • Total Marks: 50
    • MCQs: 40 Questions (1 mark each)
    • Match the Following: 2 Questions (10 marks)
    • Descriptive: 4 Questions (5 marks each)
